description:
To say that I was excited about Mark's return for a little man-on-man action would be an understatement. He took some time to coming to that decision, but it was well worth the wait, because he is really, really hot!
He was excited about the idea of getting his beautiful dick worked over by another guy, because it was something entirely new and he didn't know what to expect.
Ethan was also excited. He's been honing his cock-sucking skills and has actually gotten pretty good at deep throating.
I love to take guys to the beach because it's a great way for them to get to know each other, and once we got there the excitement really kicked up. Mark was awestruck with the beauty of the area!
The big surprise came when the two of them were sitting there by the cliff, enjoying the waves. They leaned in to kiss each other, and made out, tongues and all, right there with not a care in the world. Then they looked into each others' eyes and smiled. I knew this was going to be fun!
title: Mark & Ethan
